  • The top 12 players will be selected at the end of the promo period to receive the prizes above. Click here to see the Leaderboard

  • The player who wagered the highest,will be rank #1 on the leaderboard. If there are more than one player who have the same total wager amount,the player who reached it first will get the highest position on the leaderboard.

  • To claim their prizes,players must contact customer service via Live Chat and provide their full name,address,and phone number.

  • Freespins must be rolled over 6x prior to withdrawal of winnings.

  • Freebets in MSPORTS and SABA must be rolled over 5x prior to withdrawal of winnings.

  • Freebets in Live Casino must be rolled over 8x prior to withdrawal of winnings.

  • Tangible item prizes are convertible to Freebet bonus in MSports up to 20% of the actual prize value with 28x RO. 

  • Rollover must be fulfilled within 7 days to prevent forfeiture of the bonus and winning amount.

  • The leaderboard will be updated at the end of the promo period. Winners will be awarded with Freespins on 27th December 2021 at 15:0 (GMT+8).

  • Only real money wagered on Casino Slots count towards this promotion.

  • Players must place a minimum deposit of MYR 30 in order to withdraw winnings.

  • The bonus will be auto redeemed if balance falls below MYR 1.

  • All draw bets,void bets,bets on Decimal odds below 1.5 (Malay odds .5;HK odds .5;Indo odds -2) and all bets on excluded games will not be included in the calculation for any turnover and rollover requirement.

  • M88 reserves the right to amend,suspend,or cancel the promotion at any time and without prior notice.

  • M88 General Terms & Conditions apply.
